title: location
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, IN, USA

title: plot
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: experimental plot, which corresponds to planting treatment (1 - 10)

title: sp
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: species (Ev = Elymus virginicus, Mv = Microstegium vimineum)

title: ID
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: plant ID (A = focal adult, 1 - 3 = focal seedlings)

title: infec
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not at least two lesions were present on at least on leaf of the plant

title: leaves_tot
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: number of leaves on a tiller

title: leaves_infec
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: number of leaves with at least two lesions on that same tiller

title: Bp_spots_Ev
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not Elymus individuals appeared to have Bipolaris infection (leopard-like spots)

title: seeds_observed
focal_size_disease_jul_2018_density_exp: indicator variable of whether or not seeds were observed
